LanguageData.VFEM2_ThrowingAxe.label: throwing axe
LanguageData.VFEM2_ThrowingAxe.description: A single-handed axe made for throwing. Light enough to be thrown accurately at medium range, it's also a great melee weapon in the hands of a capable warrior.
LanguageData.VFEM2_ThrowingAxe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VFEM2_ThrowingAxe.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.VFEM2V_ThrowingAxe_Thrown.label: thrown axe
LanguageData.VFEM2_Gun_Arquebus.label: arquebus
LanguageData.VFEM2_Gun_Arquebus.description: An ancient firearm with a smoothbore barrel, the arquebus delivers powerful shots at decent range. The lead balls lose velocity and damage with distance, and are extremely ineffective against armor. Due to the chempowder reaction when firing the arquebus, plumes of blindsmoke are ejected from the barrel.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Gun_Arquebus.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VFEM2_Gun_Arquebus.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VFEM2_Bullet_Arquebus.label: arquebus grapeshot
LanguageData.VFEM2_Gun_HandCannon.label: hand cannon
LanguageData.VFEM2_Gun_HandCannon.description: An ancient crude but deadly firearm, the hand cannon fires a devastating grapeshot over a short distance. The lead balls lose velocity and damage with distance, and are extremely ineffective against armor. Due to the chempowder reaction when firing the arquebus, plumes of blindsmoke are ejected from the barrel.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Gun_HandCannon.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VFEM2_Gun_HandCannon.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VFEM2_Bullet_HandCannon.label: handcannon grapeshot
LanguageData.VFEM2_Arbalest.label: arbalest
LanguageData.VFEM2_Arbalest.description: A powerful crossbow. Fires a heavy bolt over extreme distances, but takes a long time to cock it due to the need to use the cranequin.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Arbalest.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.VFEM2_Bolt_Arbalest.label: arbalest bolt
LanguageData.VFEM2_Warbow.label: warbow
LanguageData.VFEM2_Warbow.description: A powerful, long variant of the greatbow. While it doesn’t excel at hitting nearby enemies, arrows fired from the warbow curve over walls and can be fired without requiring line of sight.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Warbow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.VFEM2_Arrow_Warbow.label: warbow arrow
